players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
Bob: "I agree with Diana. Let's all keep a close eye on each other to ensure the safety of our town."
You: "Let's work together to uncover any suspicious behavior and eliminate the mafia."
Diana: "I'd like to suggest that we focus on identifying any unusual patterns or behaviors among us. It's important that we all remain open-minded and communicate effectively with each other."

Bob: "I'd like to propose that we all share any information or suspicions we may have about each other. This will help us work together more effectively in identifying and eliminating the mafia from our midst."
You: "I suggest we start by sharing any information or suspicions we have. This will help us work together more effectively to identify and eliminate the mafia."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
You: "I agree with Diana. Let's all keep a close eye on each other to ensure the safety of our town."
Alice: "Let's work together to uncover any suspicious behavior and eliminate the mafia."
Diana: "I'd like to suggest that we focus on identifying any unusual patterns or behaviors among us. It's important that we all remain open-minded and communicate effectively with each other."

You: "I'd like to propose that we all share any information or suspicions we may have about each other. This will help us work together more effectively in identifying and eliminating the mafia from our midst."
Alice: "I suggest we start by sharing any information or suspicions we have. This will help us work together more effectively to identify and eliminate the mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
